title: AI System Analyst
description: About the Role We are seeking a AI System Analyst to play a key role in the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI), Large Language Models (LLM), and chatbot technologies within our new smart building management platform. This platform is designed to optimize operations internally for our organization while positioning itself for external commercialization in the future. A core goal of this platform is to enhance understanding and utilization of client data, enabling smarter decision-making and optimized building management. By leveraging AI and LLM technologies, the platform will provide deep insights into client behaviors, preferences, and operational patterns, driving efficiency and personalization. As the System Analyst, you will be responsible for assessing the current architecture, proposing innovative AI-driven enhancements, and leading resource allocation efforts to drive new feature development. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, engage with external vendors, and ensure the seamless execution of strategic initiatives. Key Responsibilities -Architectural Analysis & Enhancement -Evaluate the platform’s existing architecture and recommend improvements for scalability, efficiency, and AI-readiness. -Ensure a robust infrastructure for seamless AI and LLM integration. AI, LLM & Chatbot Integration -Actively propose innovative ideas for incorporating AI-driven functionalities that enhance automation and efficiency. -Lead exploratory research to identify emerging AI solutions that align with business objectives. Client Data Utilization & Insights -Develop methodologies for harnessing client data to improve operational efficiency and enhance decision-making. -Utilize AI analytics to extract meaningful insights, optimize services, and enable predictive modeling. Resource Allocation & Vendor Management -Anticipate and manage resource needs to develop new platform features in collaboration with vendors. -Oversee budget allocation, project timelines, and vendor deliverables. Strategic Dashboard & Analysis -Develop data-driven dashboards for internal presentations to track project status, feature adoption, and performance insights. -Conduct regular strategic analyses to support decision-making and optimize the platform’s commercialization strategy. Qualifications & Skills -Proven experience in system analysis, AI/LLM technologies, and platform/software architecture. -Technical background in smart building management solutions is a plus. -Experience in resource allocation, vendor negotiations, and project oversight. -Ability to create engaging dashboards and conduct business strategy analyses. -Excellent communication and problem-solving skills with a forward-thinking mindset. -Ability to converse in both Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese) and English.

title: Senior AI Transformation Analyst
description: Company Description About SEEK SEEK’s portfolio of diverse businesses make a positive impact on a truly global scale. Our purpose is to help people live more fulfilling and productive working lives and help organisations succeed. We create world-class technology solutions to connect more people to relevant employment, education, small business and volunteer opportunities. We have a culture of high-performance in our workplaces and celebrate the diversity of our employees who contribute to the success of our organisation. Life at SEEK SEEK’s purpose is at the centre of everything we do. Our SEEK, which defines the way we work, is all about what makes us unique and a little bit different. Passion, Team, Delivery and Future are our principles that drive innovation and creativity. SEEK strives to support employee wellbeing by providing an amazing experience at work which led us to being named AFR BOSS Top 10 Best Places to work in technology for the fourth year in a row. We are proud to work in an environment that's inclusive where everyone's unique ideas, experiences and perspectives are valued. Our award-winning head office in Cremorne (just a 4 min walk from Richmond station) provides an exceptional space to collaborate with colleagues. The building provides sweeping views of the city, a games area, sit and stand desks at every workstation, modern end-of-trip facilities and Thursday night drinks which gives our people an opportunity to connect in a social setting. Job Description The Team AI for SEEK team is part of the broader SEEK AI Group which includes over 200 AI professionals delivering AI services for our core products under the Group Executive, AI. The AI for SEEK team is responsible for driving operational excellence and continuous improvement within SEEK by identifying, testing, developing / adopting innovative AI solutions that improve productivity and operational efficiency. This role reports to the Head of AI Transformation. About the role As the Senior AI Transformation Analyst, you will play a key role in SEEK's strategic AI adoption journey, driving enterprise-wide transformation that enhances operational excellence and market competitiveness.. You will work closely with teams and leaders across SEEK to educate the business on AI capabilities and risks, identify and prioritise opportunities, run experiments, procure and implement AI tools, and track and report on benefits. This dynamic and ambiguous space demands critical thinking and a flexible mindset, combining knowledge of AI capabilities with SEEK’s operational and marketplace goals and strong commercial and problem solving skills. Responsibilities Strategic AI Transformation: Strategic AI Transformation: Lead development of long-term AI strategies aligned with SEEK's business objectives. Independently manage complex, high-value transformation projects from conception through implementation, including budget oversight and investment planning. Business Process Optimisation: Analyze workflows to identify AI enhancement opportunities and handle ambiguous, enterprise-wide challenges requiring cross-functional collaboration. Partner with senior stakeholders to optimize processes and translate business needs into technical requirements. Project & Change Management: Oversee project deliverables while building stakeholder relationships to secure adoption buy-in. Conduct impact assessments and develop implementation plans that address potential challenges and ensure projects meet timelines and objectives. User Education: Collaborate with L&D, RAI, workplace experience and functional teams to design and deliver training programs to educate users on new processes, AI tools and technologies. Provide ongoing support and resources to ensure successful adoption. Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Monitor the performance of AI solutions, capture feedback and identify opportunities for optimization. Collect and analyze data to measure the qualitative and quantitative benefits of AI initiatives, and make data-driven recommendations for improvements. Innovation and Continuous Improvement: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in AI and digital transformation. Propose innovative solutions and continuous improvement initiatives to enhance business processes and drive commercial growth. AI Community Development: Establish a community of practice to drive better AI adoption across SEEK including building a library of prompts and chatbots, identification of opportunities and building a core team of AI expertise to drive everyday innovation on the ground. Qualifications Skills and experience Demonstrated expertise in business process analysis, project coordination, and change management. Strong commercial acumen with a solid understanding of AI concepts, capable of translating qualitative and quantitative metrics into business benefits/ROI. Strong aptitude for learning and a keen interest in emerging AI concepts and current industry trends. Excellent critical thinking, problem-solving, research, and analytics skills. Experience with Salesforce, Workday, marketing automation, and conversational AI technologies is highly preferred. Other Qualifications, Skills and Experience The following experience is preferred, but not essential: 5+ years of experience in AI transformation, business analysis, or related fields Demonstrated success in delivering multiple complex initiatives with measurable business impact Proven ability to independently manage high-value transformation projects from ideation through execution Additional Information Permanent Perks At SEEK we offer: Annual Performance Bonus Plan Paid and unpaid leave benefits including Personal Flexi Days and Volunteer Days, as well as the opportunity to purchase additional leave Support for parents with 14 weeks paid primary carers leave and 2 weeks paid leave for partners SEEK is committed to operating sustainably, certified carbon neutral for its business operations (through Climate Active), purchasing renewable energy for our office and working-from-home emissions and a target for net zero by 2030. The opportunity to work from anywhere for up to 4 weeks per financial year At SEEK, we are passionate about fostering a culture of inclusion and wellbeing that embraces and values the diversity of our people. We are a purpose driven business that works with heart. We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us. Should you require any specific support or adjustments throughout the recruitment process and beyond, please advise us and we will be happy to assist. For this role, only those candidates with the eligible right to work will be considered. SEEK kindly requests no unsolicited resumes or approaches from recruitment agencies and will not be responsible for any associated fees.

Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including presenting technical concepts and solution designs to non-technical audiences. What we need to see from you The candidate should possess as much as possible of the following skills Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field. Minimum of 5 years of proven experience. At least 3 years of experience working in software development within cloud platforms and minimum 2 years of experience working in Pre-sales architecture. Proficiency in designing architectures focused on APIs and application integration. Experience in defining architectures within Azure, leveraging Azure Data Services such as Azure analysis services, Azure SQL, Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Fabric, and Power BI Services. Competence in data integration, automation, and monitoring. Ability to translate business requirements into scalable and efficient technical solutions. Adaptability to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Collaboration skills to work effectively within cross-functional teams. Attention to detail to ensure accuracy and quality in architectural designs. Desirable Qualifications: Relevant certifications in Data Science, Machine Learning, or Artificial Intelligence. Experience with cloud-based data platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Advanced knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R. Experience with big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka. Work experience with containers and basic infrastructure knowledge. Proficiency in consuming services from AWS and Azure, including the ability to work with cloud calculators. Familiarity with Serverless computing and continuous monitoring of applications.

title: Head of Data & AI
description: Our client is a top-tier property developer with multiple high-end portfolios (shopping malls, hotels, office buildings) and lifestyle brands in Hong Kong and Asia. They are currently looking for Head of Data & AI with a track record in operating group-level data platforms, delivering data analytics services and introducing new AI products to different senior stakeholders and business units. Job Description - Be the leader of the team in a group level to formulate and implement a data and analytics vision that supports strategic and tactical business opportunities across all regions. This includes creating and managing data and analytics strategies, establishing data governance processes, and driving the transformation of the data foundation to achieve measurable business outcomes. - Oversee the development of data modeling and AI products, ensuring the adoption and exploitation of AI capabilities. Lead and manage the company’s data-driven innovation and analytics initiatives, focusing on accelerating digital business transformation and delivering value-oriented outcomes that align with the company’s strategic objectives. - Develop the partnership with executive and business stakeholders to identify and prioritize their needs, focusing on business outcomes and enabling functions to maximize the value derived from data and AI capabilities, ensuring alignment with business objectives - Create and oversee a centralized data governance and management service for group-level consistency, and decentralized data stewardship for business-level agility. Ensure data quality, traceability, timeliness, usability, and cost-effectiveness across the company, supporting both strategic and operational needs - Establish and maintain trust in data assets by instituting governance mechanisms for data and algorithms used in reporting, analysis, and automated decision-making. - Establish, monitor, and take appropriate action on key performance metrics and objectives to ensure the successful delivery of data and AI initiatives. Track regulatory compliance and data ethics, ensuring adherence to laws and standards across regions, to mitigate risks and enhance trust - Foster a data-driven culture by developing and nurturing data and analytics talent. Lead transformation efforts to mature the company’s data and analytics capabilities, promoting data literacy, continuous improvement, and innovation within the team to ensure long-term success and adaptability Successful applicant - Bachelor’s degree with a minimum 12 years of relevant experience, including 6 years of experience in data domains, such as BI analytics, data product, data science and modeling, and data architecture. Background from Retail, luxury, FMCG/Consumer Goods, or Banking industry is preferred - Proven track record in progressive leadership experience in cross-functional teams and enterprise-wide data and analytics programs - Strong interpersonal skills and business acumen including the ability to communicate effectively with executive and business stakeholders, and drive business transformation through data-driven insights and data literacy development across the company - Proficiency in strategic business and technology planning. Expertise in leading regulatory and compliance programs related to data and analytics methodologies - Experience in integrating complex, cross-corporate processes and information strategies, and designing strategic metrics and scorecards - Outstanding analytical and problem-solving abilities, with familiarity in business information generation and analysis methods. Ability to frame new concepts for future products and services needs - Excellent command of written and spoken English and Chinese, including Putonghua

description: Join Our Dynamic Team! Are you passionate about driving business growth in the IT, Cloud and AI solutions industry? Do you have a knack for identifying opportunities and building lasting relationships with customers? If so, we want you to join our team as a Business Development Manager! Responsibilities: Conduct in-depth market research to uncover potential clients and partnerships within the IT, Cloud and AI solutions landscape. Develop strategic approaches to reach and connect with high-potential prospects. Develop and implement creative strategies to initiate and deepen customer relationships, with a clear focus on expanding our market presence in IT and cloud solutions. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred, though relevant experience may also qualify. 2-5 years of demonstrated success in IT solution sales, with specific experience in cloud and AI solutions highly desirable. Proven ability to quickly absorb and apply knowledge of new technologies, particularly within the cloud solutions and IT services arena. Strong verbal and written communication skills in both English and Chinese, with a talent for fostering clear, persuasive interactions. Self-motivated and responsible with a proactive approach to collaboration, contributing effectively to team goals. Solid experience developing and executing winning business development strategies in IT, Cloud and AI solutions. title: LLM Engineer (Data and Optimization)
company_name: TCL Corporate Research (Hong Kong) Co., Limited
description: Job Description As a Large Model Algorithm Engineer, you will focus on the technical research and development of Large Language Models (LLMs) and multimodal large models, driving their application in industrial vertical domains. You will participate in core processes such as model training, optimization, and inference deployment while collaborating with top university research teams to explore cutting-edge technologies and improve model performance and efficiency. Key Responsibilities Responsible for training, fine-tuning (SFT), and system deployment of vertical domain large models, promoting efficient application of large models in industrial environments. Research and implement compression and optimization techniques for large models, including pruning, quantization, and knowledge distillation, to improve inference efficiency and deployment performance. Participate in the algorithm design and development of RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and Agent modules to enhance reasoning capabilities in dynamic and complex environments. Research and apply multimodal understanding technologies to optimize the application of Large Vision Models (LVM) in industrial vision and other fields. Translate business rules into efficient workflow code and participate in the design and implementation of Agentic Workflow to enhance workflow intelligence. Build industry datasets to support large model training and applications, including data preprocessing, pretraining data construction, and training/application/evaluation dataset setup. Research and implement large model merging techniques, exploring collaborative optimization solutions for multiple models. Develop and maintain validation, evaluation, and performance monitoring processes for large models to ensure system stability and usability. Participate in the development and optimization of large model application platforms (microservices) to enhance system modularity and usability. Qualifications Master’s degree or higher in Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field is preferred. Proficient in machine learning, deep learning, and Transformer architecture, with hands-on experience in end-to-end training and development of large models. Familiar with large model compression and optimization methods such as pruning, quantization, and knowledge distillation. Strong capabilities in large-scale data processing and familiarity with big data tools (e.g., Hadoop, Spark), with experience in data preprocessing, cleaning, and building training datasets. Skilled in Python, C/C++, and Linux programming, with a solid foundation in algorithms and data structures. Familiar with mainstream large model training and inference frameworks such as PyTorch, Hugging Face (HF), DeepSpeed, PEFT, vLLM, TRL, etc. Knowledge of Triton or other high-performance inference tools, with experience in applying model optimization to real-world deployments. Proficient in Docker and Linux shell scripting; experience with FastAPI development is a plus. Experience in enterprise-level large model development, optimization, deployment, and tool development is preferred. Strong teamwork and communication skills, capable of collaborating with cross-domain teams. Passionate about cutting-edge large model technologies and their applications in industrial vertical domains. Bonus Points Experience in RAG systems and Agent module development and optimization. Familiarity with CUDA programming, distributed computing, or related high-performance computing technologies. Publications in top-tier conferences (e.g., NeurIPS, ICLR, CVPR). Knowledge of hardware acceleration technologies (e.g., GPU, TPU) and their applications in model optimization.

title: Data Analyst
description: We are seeking a talented professional to support and drive the integration of AI, machine learning, and data-driven solutions into our engineering design workflows. The successful candidate will leverage tools such as Python, Scikit-learn, PyTorch, and LLMs, along with computer vision techniques, to develop innovative in-house software solutions. Key Responsibilities Design, develop, and implement machine learning models using libraries such as Scikit-learn and PyTorch to optimize design workflows and project outcomes. Build and deploy AI-driven tools, including Large Language Models (LLMs) for chatbots computer vision systems for image recognition, to support engineers for design validation, site monitoring, and automation. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable Python code to integrate AI solutions into existing workflows and in-house software platforms. Collaborate with engineers to understand project requirements, translate technical needs into data-driven solutions, and provide actionable insights. Develop and maintain database structures (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) to store and manage project-related data effectively. Analyze datasets from infrastructure projects to identify patterns, improve decision-making, and enhance design efficiency. Stay updated on emerging AI technologies and propose innovative applications. Support the development of in-house software tools by providing technical expertise and ensuring seamless integration with engineering processes. Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, including management team and engineers, in a clear and concise manner. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or equivalent Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in data analysis, machine learning, or software development, preferably in an engineering or construction context. Proficiency in Python, with hands-on experience using Scikit-learn, PyTorch, or similar ML and deep learning frameworks. Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and computer vision techniques for applications such as image recognition or object detection Strong understanding of database design and management, e.g. SQL, MongoDB, or similar platform. Experience with cloud platforms, e.g. AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, for deploying AI models and managing data pipelines. Experience with software development practices, including version control, e.g. Git and collaborative coding. Passion for innovation and a proactive approach to applying AI and data science in real-world infrastructure challenges. Knowledge of construction or infrastructure project, including CAD / BIM design workflows is a plus but not mandatory. Fluency in English with proficiency in Cantonese or Mandarin is advantageous. Interested parties are invited to send full resume stating reference code, availability, present and expected salaries and daytime contact telephone number by clicking “Quick Apply”. Applicants not being informed of any interview arrangement within 6 weeks from your date of application may assume your application not successful. Personal information contained in applications received will be used for employment-related purposes and, in respect of the successful appointee only, also for business-related purposes.

title: AI Manager
description: About Wisers Wisers is a leading expert in business intelligence and media big data analytics, leveraging advanced AI technologies to provide insights for over 3,000 corporate clients across all industries, including both public and private sectors. Our top-tier Chinese NLP, computer vision, and augmented analytical technologies transform vast amounts of data into actionable insights, helping our clients make strategic decisions. About The Job As an AI Manager, you will lead the development and deployment of production AI solutions specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Computer Vision (CV). You’ll architect systems that strategically combine models to enhance performance, driving projects from research to deployment while aligning cross-functional stakeholders. While deep expertise in NLP or CV is essential, experience with agentic systems or augmented analytics would be a valuable complement to tackle advanced use cases. Key Responsibilities Lead end-to-end AI project lifecycle management for NLP and CV applications Design and optimize NLP systems including text classification, named entity recognition, and language generation Develop and implement CV solutions for object detection, image classification, and video analysis Architect AI solutions that may combine multiple models through aggregation when beneficial Manage the integration of large language models (LLMs) and multimodal AI systems Manage the maintenance of NLP, CV and LLM systems to ensure reliability and performance Collaborate with data scientists to optimize model performance and scalability Establish best practices for data processing and model evaluation pipelines Monitor production AI systems and implement continuous improvements Stay updated with advancements in NLP and LLM research, incorporating relevant techniques into projects. About You Core Competencies Master’s and above in computer science, AI, ML, or related field 5+ years hands-on AI/ML experience, including 2+ years managing end-to-end AI projects in production environments Hands-on NLP expertise: Transformers (BERT, GPT), LLM fine-tuning (DeepSeek, Claude), and Chinese NLP applications Production-level computer vision experience: CNNs, vision transformers, and multimodal AI systems Proficient in Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, and cloud-based MLOps deployment Practical experience with model aggregation, ensemble methods, and multimodal system integration Track record of deploying optimized LLMs for domain-specific use cases Fluency in English and Putonghua Preferred Qualifications Experience with agentic AI systems or augmented analytics platforms Publications or patents in NLP/CV fields Strong track record in international AI competitions and/or with patents or publications in top-tier NLP/ML/CV venues Why Join Us? At Wisers, you'll have the opportunity to make a significant impact in a steadily growing organization with immense potential. We offer: Competitive salary with discretionary bonuses Comprehensive medical insurance, including dental benefits Exposure to pioneer next-generation AI capabilities through unparalleled hands-on leadership across NLP, computer vision, and emerging paradigms Friendly, dynamic, and collaborative working environment Fully stocked pantry with a variety of games for relaxation

title: AI Programmer/Specialist (Ref.: 200127)
company_name: Laboratory of Data Discovery for Health Limited
description: Applications are invited for appointment as AI Programmer/Specialist, to commence as soon as possible. The appointee will join the Laboratory of Data Discovery for Health (D24H), a start-up company incorporated by The University of Hong Kong (HKU) that is led by senior faculty members of the Li Ka Shing Faculty of Medicine at HKU. The D24H sets to play pivotal role in gathering and curating massive, unique data resources and to develop new, deep, frontier analytics in protecting global public health and improving individual healthcare through precision medicine. The appointee will be involved in the design, implement, and test AI software for analysing large healthcare related data, including data in electronic health record, medical images, text data, and sensor data from wearable devices and smartphones (Internet of Things; IoT). The appointee will work in a highly motivated inter-disciplinary team to develop mobile applications, cloud computing solutions or other AI-enabled computational solutions for our multiple healthcare related projects in the R&D team. Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Bioinformatics, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Statistics, Biomedical Engineering or a related discipline. New graduates are welcome; Holders of Master’s or Doctoral Degree, or those with substantial relevant experience may be considered for the appointment as Senior AI Specialist; Competent in computer programming including experience in artificial intelligence or machine learning; Self-motivated, organised, and be able to work effectively in an interdisciplinary team; and Experience in mobile app development, IoT technology, or cloud computing is highly desirable. Applicants should apply and attach an application letter and a detailed resume stating the current and expected salary. The personal data provided in your application process will be used for recruitment and other employment-related purposes, and may be transferred and disclosed to, and used by HKU Innovation Holdings Limited and The University of Hong Kong for the above purposes. We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates.

title: IT Sales & Business Development Manager/ Director (SaaS, B2B AI & Cloud)
description: Brightoil Petroleum is a leading player in the oil and gas industry. As one of the earliest private petroleum enterprises in China, we have consistently been ranked among the top500 enterprises in the country. Our aim is to integrate traditional energy with intelligent technology, ensuring efficient supply, high-quality products, and cost savings for our customers. Responsible for sales of SaaS software products in the region, actively developing new clients, maintaining relationships with existing clients, and improving client retention and activity rates. title: AI Integration Specialist - Research and Product Development
description: Our client: Our client is a leading global telecom service provider seeking an AI Integration Specialist to support their AI product development projects. Candidate with hands on experience in AI development or research related projects is a must. IANG / TTPS are welcome. Your role: Plan data products, technologies, platforms, and processes. Stay abreast of industry data trends and key technological advancements, conduct comprehensive and forward-looking planning and design, and oversee data-related development work, ensuring progress, quality control, result transformation, and project delivery. Establish a layered data development system according to the company’s data work plan, and develop and improve standardized processes for data products, data applications, and data delivery. Continuously innovate and optimize to make data drive business. Integrate data science and data technology to solve practical business problems and streamline processes. Manage communication and collaboration among the company, clients, and departments throughout the data lifecycle planning, pre-research, development, release, and iteration processes, ensuring smooth and efficient communication. Fully responsible for building and nurturing the company’s data team, ensuring the stability of the data platform and development team, establishing and improving the promotion mechanism for data personnel. Participate in technical reviews, providing reference opinions on the rationality of technical solutions, architectural compliance, and project operation norms. Resolve key issues, faults, and technical challenges in big data systems. Participate in the extraction and analysis of system requirements and the design of business system data dictionaries. Requirement: Master’s degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Automation, or related fields preferred. Work Experience: 6 years or more of work experience. Over 5 years of experience as a technical leader in big data, cloud computing, or artificial intelligence industries preferred. Proficiency in deploying, using, and maintaining common foundational software such as Hadoop, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Flink, Elasticsearch, with relevant certification qualifications. Mastery of one or more mainstream programming and database languages, with a deep understanding of database performance bottlenecks and optimization methods, and proficiency in relational database management systems, related technologies, and tools. Experience in designing business models related to provincial BOMS domains for telecom operators preferred. Experience in implementing big data application projects in the telecom industry preferred. Experience in building a complete data platform and technical system from scratch, with a system and methodology for data-driven innovation. Experience in big data, AI, intelligent operation and maintenance of communication networks, and AI-related technology empowerment for business preferred. Holding two or more certifications such as AWS Data Engineer Associate, National Database Engineer Certification, or equivalent preferred. title: AI & Data Engineer
description: Team: Small cross-functional team of AI and medical experts Focus: Organizing production data, fine-tuning AI chat models, supporting product R&D acceleration Role Summary We are seeking a motivated and curious AI & Data Engineer to join our innovative team. You will play a key role in managing and organizing production data pipelines and assisting in the fine-tuning of AI chat models to accelerate product research and development in the medical AI domain. This is an excellent opportunity for early-career professionals eager to grow their skills in AI, data engineering, and healthcare technology.Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain data pipelines to organize and preprocess production data for AI model training and evaluation. Collaborate with AI researchers and medical experts to fine-tune AI chat models, ensuring data quality and relevance. Support data integration from multiple sources, ensuring clean, accurate, and structured datasets for AI workflows. Assist in monitoring and optimizing AI model performance and data pipeline efficiency. Assist in prompt engineering and testing to improve AI chatbot performance in clinical scenarios Participate in data labeling and annotation tasks for supervised learning and model evaluation. Contribute to internal tooling and dashboards to monitor data quality and model behavior. Document data processes, pipelines, and model tuning experiments for team collaboration. Stay up-to-date with AI and data engineering best practices and tools relevant to model fine-tuning and production data management. Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or related field (fresh graduates or up to 2 years experience preferred). Strong curiosity and eagerness to learn about AI, machine learning, and data engineering in a medical context. Basic programming skills in Python, Langchain; familiarity with data manipulation libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy). Understanding of relational databases and SQL for querying structured data, data pipeline concepts, ETL processes, and data quality principles. Exposure or interest in AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face is a plus. Ability to work collaboratively in a small, interdisciplinary team environment. Good communication skills in English; Cantonese proficiency is a plus. Detail-oriented with strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Legally permitted to work in Hong Kong. Preferred Skills (Nice to Have) Experience or coursework related to natural language processing (NLP) or chatbots. Exposure to vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone) and semantic search concepts. Experience with automated testing or data validation tools to ensure model and pipeline reliability. Familiarity with cloud platforms (preferably GCP) and data pipeline tools Knowledge of data privacy and compliance considerations in healthcare data.

title: Robotic Software Engineer
description: KASE (International) Technology Company Limited - Founded in 2014, with headquarters in Hong Kong and a dedicated engineering team in China, KASE Automation excels in creating innovative products and solutions across the spectrum of automation and robotics. The company's strength lies in its superior robotics development, as evidenced by an impressive portfolio of advanced robotic arms and automated feeding equipment. These products represent our capacity to deliver precise, efficient, and reliable robotics tailor-made for a variety of applications. In addition to product development, KASE Automation also provides comprehensive services, including customized machine design, computational fluid dynamics (CFD), and finite element analysis (FEA). With a strong focus on technological innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction, KASE Automation emerges as a reliable partner for businesses intent on integrating advanced robotics into their operations. Job Responsibilities Design and implementation of robotic system software architectures Development of software for IoT projects Development of control schemes for autonomous robots Integration, deployment and testing of the autonomy software onto autonomous robots Continuous interaction with customers, and teammates Job Requirements A relevant Engineering Degree(s) in Computer Science, Robotics or related field Minimum 5+ years of experience in robotics Experience in developing robotic system software and GUI Experience in wireless network applications in autonomous robots Expert with ROS or ROS2 Experience with GUI design using QT or PYQT, others related libraries Proficient in writing quality object-oriented code in C++, Python in a Linux environment Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently and as part of a team Good communication and interpersonal skills Passion for technology and a desire to continuously learn and improve Interested parties please send your full resume and your expected salary to Group HR Department by clicking "Apply Now" button.

title: Project Manager - AI Solutions
description: Come and join a Winning Team Be remarkable. Be yourself. Why Should You Join Us? At AS Watson, we believe in our people, in teamwork and the importance of your personal growth. If you are looking for the opportunity to join our award-winning international family with over 16,900 O+O stores across 30 markets in Asia and Europe, the AS Watson family welcomes you… You can enjoy : Conveniently located in Whampoa, less than 5 min. walk from MTR Cozy office with contemporary design Comprehensive Medical and Life insurance coverage, including your spouse and children Role Purpose: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Project Manager to lead our AI and Analytics initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in project management, particularly Agile Scrum methodologies, and a proven track record in delivering data products. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive projects from conception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with our strategic goals. A typical day in this Role: Lead and manage multiple projects in the AI and Analytics domain, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. Apply Agile Scrum methodologies to facilitate project planning, execution, and monitoring. Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and engineers to define project requirements and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation. Monitor and report on project progress, addressing any issues or risks that arise. Foster a collaborative team environment and promote effective communication among stakeholders. Utilize analytical skills to assess project performance and identify areas for improvement. Ensure adherence to best practices in project management and data governance. This job is a good fit for You if: You are a DETAILER. You deliberate fully before making decisions and will need to see all the facts before reaching a conclusion. You follow up rigorously. You are a STABILISER. You’re methodical, careful and disciplined. You believe it’s important to follow a structured process and like structure in your work. You are a COMMUNICATOR. You have an ability to pick up on people’s underlying motivations and these insights makes you persuasive and inspiring. You are a COMMANDER. You take the initiative and tend to start discussions and move groups into new areas of exploration, towards the goal. Success will depend on: Solid knowledge in relevant fields, such as Business, Computer Science, or Data Science. 5+ years of project management experience, preferably in AI, data analytics, or technology sectors. Strong knowledge of Agile Scrum principles and methodologies; Scrum Master certification is a plus. Proven experience in delivering data products and managing the entire project lifecycle. Excellent analytical skills with a strong ability to interpret data and metrics. Proficient in project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello, Microsoft Project). Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels. English fluency is a must Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. What is holding you back? Don’t miss out on this great chance to shape Your life! Apply now! We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates. The information provided will be treated in strict confidence and be used only for consideration of your application for relevant/ similar posts within the AS Watson Group. #WorkinHK

LLMs to achieve desired outputs and improve the accuracy and relevance of generated content. * Create and maintain embedding pipelines for indexing and retrieving information from large datasets. * Evaluate and monitor the performance of machine learning models and systems, identifying areas for improvement and implementing solutions. * Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to define requirements and develop innovative solutions. * Contribute to the development of our machine learning infrastructure and best practices. * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in machine learning and NLP, and evaluate their potential application to our products. * Develop and maintain clear, concise, and well-documented code. * Full stack development experience is a plus Qualifications: * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or a related field. * 3+ years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer. * Strong proficiency in Python and experience with relevant libraries such as Langchain, LlamaIndex, AutoGen, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, and spaCy/NLTK/transformers. * Proven experience in prompt engineering and optimizing LLM performance. * Hands-on experience designing and implementing RAG architectures and embedding techniques. * Solid understanding of neural network architectures, training methodologies, and optimization techniques. * Strong understanding of NLP concepts and techniques, including text preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation. * A solid understanding of software engineering principles and best practices. * Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills. Bonus Points: * Experience with Azure AI Search (formerly Cognitive Search) and other cloud-based search technologies. * Familiarity with full-stack development concepts and experience with relevant technologies (e.g., React, Node.js, SQL/NoSQL databases). * Experience with MLOps principles and practices, including model deployment, monitoring, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD). * Contributions to open-source machine learning projects.

title: Senior Engineer/ Eng/ Engineering Associate (PI), FinTech Software Development
company_name: Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute Company Limited
description: The Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) was founded by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 2000 with the mission of enhancing Hong Kong’s competitiveness through applied research. ASTRI’s core R&D competence in various areas is grouped under five Technology Divisions: Communications Technologies, Artificial Intelligence and Trust Technologies, Advanced Electronic Components and Systems, IoT Sensing and AI Technologies, and Innovative Mind. It is applied across six core areas which are Smart City, Financial Technologies, New Industrialisation and Intelligent Manufacturing, Digital Health, Application Specific Integrated Circuits, and Metaverse. Over the years, ASTRI has nurtured a pool of research, I&T talents and received numerous international awards for its pioneering innovations as well as outstanding business and community contributions. To date, ASTRI has transferred almost 1,500 technologies to the industries and been granted more than 1,100 patents in the Mainland, the US, and other countries. To support our constant endeavour to position Hong Kong as a world-class smart city and an international hub of innovation and technology, we are seeking qualified professionals to fill the following position(s): Job Responsibilities: Assist in ITF R&D project as assigned. Research and develop algorithms and software for emerging technologies related to artificial intelligence (AI), cryptography, and secured systems including blockchains. Explore and evaluate state-of-the-art AI models and develop working prototypes including data preparation, model development and performance validation. Collaborate with team members throughout the full product development and testing lifecycle. Conduct software testing and write and maintain technical documentation and reports. Perform ad hoc duties as assigned. Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or higher in STEM-related disciplines (e.g., Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Information Engineering, Physics, or other relevant disciplines). Experience or strong knowledge in one or more programming languages: Python, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, NodeJS, Solidity, Go, Rust, C++, C, or R. Familiarity with data science, machine learning techniques (e.g. self-supervised learning, reinforcement learning) and frameworks such as PyTorch or Keras is a plus. Experience in research of generative models (e.g. transformers, diffusion models, VAE/GAN) is a plus. Experience with fine-tuning and deploying large language models is a plus. Knowledge of cryptographic principles, blockchain technologies, and system security practices (e.g., sandboxing, secure containerization, and runtime security measures) is a plus. Familiarity with back-end frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot, Django, Flask, FastAPI) and front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js, Angular, Flutter) is a plus. Understanding of finance or economics is a plus. Enthusiasm for learning new technologies and applying them to real-world problems. Lives ASTRI's values. The appointment will be on renewable contract terms with a competitive salary. Fringe benefits include paid leave, medical insurance coverage and contribution to MPF. The incumbent will normally work a five-day week. For interested parties, please submit your application with detailed CV within two weeks of the post date. Applicants are encouraged to submit their applications as soon as possible. The review of applications will continue until post is filled. The resume should not include any sensitive personal information such as ID card no. or passport number, photo, etc. Position offer is subject to the applicant’s experience and academic qualification. The application will be open until the position is filled. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. ASTRI reserves the right not to fill the position. ASTRI is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used exclusively for recruitment only. For details, please refer to ASTRI Privacy Policy Statement.

description: Company Overview Cognitact is translating cutting-edge proteomic research findings into biotech tools for risk prediction, diagnosis and monitoring for Alzheimer’s disease (AD). Leveraging world-leading proteomics and machine-learning algorithms, we achieve accurate and cost-effective detection of Alzheimer's disease 5-10 years before symptoms manifest, in a single drop of blood. We also provide long-term monitoring service with personal therapeutic suggestions for clients and clinics to better assist disease management and prognosis. We are looking for highly motivated (Senior) Scientist(s) to join our biotech company. For more details, please visit https://www.cognitact.com/ Responsibilities Participate in R&D activities，perform biomarker screening and assay development for diagnostic purpose for neurodegenerative diseases. Coordinate and oversee end-to-end management of clinical trials, protocol design, maintenance of study files, ethics submissions, and data monitoring, liaise with vendors, and other duties, as assigned. Conduct on-site monitoring and implement risk mitigation strategies for trial success. Prepare and maintain trial documentation, such as Investigator Brochures (IB) and progress reports, in compliance with regulatory standards. Prepare product-related scientific and medical materials for training, corporate branding and pipeline marketing. Provide technical support to the sales and marketing team. Prepare detailed reports and documentation of research findings and project progress for stakeholders and regulatory bodies. Remuneration and Benefits Competitive Salary Medical Insurance Staff discount programs on test On-the-job training The appointment will be offered a renewable two-year contract, subject to mutual agreement and performance. Numerous opportunities for professional growth and development

title: 全能活动摄影师（会务/活动/人像+图片直播+短视频）
description: 岗位职责 1. 全流程活动拍摄 - 独立完成会务/庆典/发布会等活动的全场拍摄 - 精准捕捉关键环节（领导讲话、嘉宾互动、现场氛围） - 熟练操作专业摄影设备及灯光系统 2. 严苛人像后期 - 对活动人像照片进行精细化处理（皮肤质感、形体修饰） - 确保人物神态自然、画面高级感 - 批量处理同时保证单张精修质量 3. 图片直播运营 - 熟练使用喔图平台进行实时图片直播 - 把控选片-修图-上传全流程时效性 - 每场活动确保50+张优质直播图片 4. 短视频创作 - 拍摄并剪辑1-2分钟活动花絮短视频 - 制作适合新媒体传播的竖版短视频 - 基础调色及字幕包装 5. 智能工具应用 - 使用AI工具提升修图效率（如批量处理） - 尝试AIGC等新技术辅助创作 --- 任职要求 硬性条件 ▸ 3年以上商业活动拍摄经验（需提供完整活动案例） ▸ 精通LR/PS人像精修，不接受插件一键磨皮 ▸ 熟练操作佳能/索尼全画幅系统，能应对暗光环境 ▸ 有喔图网等图片直播平台实操经验 ▸ 抗压能力强 加分技能 ✓ 视频剪辑能力（Premiere/FCP） ✓ 无人机拍摄资质 ✓ 掌握AI修图工具（如Topaz系列） 个人素质 ☑能承受活动期间10+小时高强度工作 ☑对人物表情和肢体语言有敏锐捕捉力 ☑有服务高端客户的经验和耐心 --- 应聘须知 1. 请提交： - 个人作品集（含不同场景活动案例） - 人像修图前后对比图（至少3组） - 短视频作品链接（如有） 2. 通过初选者需现场测试： - 1小时人像精修测试 - 图片直播模拟操作 --- 应聘方式 📩 发送资料至[邮箱：] beonefo909@gmail.com 📌 标题格式："摄影师应聘-姓名-活动场次经验数" （如：摄影师应聘-张三-80场活动经验） 注：本岗位需随活动时间灵活调整工作时间，如有需要要在周末/节假日工作，应聘前请知悉。

title: Deputy Director/Senior Manager, Human Resources
company_name: Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute Company Limited
description: Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) was founded by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 2000 with the mission of enhancing Hong Kong’s competitiveness through applied research. ASTRI’s core R&D competence in various areas is grouped under five Technology Divisions: Advanced Electronic Components and Systems; Artificial Intelligence and Trust Technologies; Communications Technologies; IoT Sensing and AI Technologies; and Intelligent Perception and Control Technologies. It is applied across six core areas which are Smart City, Financial Technologies, New Industrialisation and Intelligent Manufacturing, Digital Health, Application Specific Integrated Circuits, and Metaverse. Over the years, ASTRI has nurtured a pool of research, I&T talents and received numerous international awards for its pioneering innovations as well as outstanding business and community contributions. To date, ASTRI has transferred almost 1,500 technologies to the industries and been granted more than 1,100 patents in the Mainland, the US, and other countries. To support our constant endeavour to position Hong Kong as a world-class smart city and an international hub of innovation and technology, we are seeking qualified professionals to fill the following position(s): Job Responsibilities: The appointee will serve as a strategic partner, reporting directly to the Senior Director of Human Resources (Head of HR). Key responsibilities include: HR Team Leadership: Act as the Deputy Head of HR, leading and collaborating with team members to deliver a comprehensive range of professional HR services, including manpower planning, budgeting, rewards management, talent acquisition, staff development, performance management, succession planning, and employee relations. Strategic Support: Assist the Head of HR in preparing HR-related Committee papers and formulating and reviewing HR, talent acquisition, and staff development strategies, initiatives, policies and procedures in alignment with organizational goals and labor law requirements. Project Leadership: Lead HR projects and programs (e.g., grading and pay structure review, staff development and engagement plans) to meet business needs, including independently delivering briefing and training sessions. HR Analytics and Reporting: Measure, evaluate, and identify performance metrics to generate insights and analytical management reports that support HR strategic planning and decision-making by senior leadership. Process Improvement: Review and streamline HR processes to enhance operational efficiency and support future business growth. Provide consistent and practical advice to address HR issues. Advisory Role: Provide expert advice and innovative solutions to line managers to ensure effective implementation of HR initiatives, and to boost workforce productivity, engagement and retention. Budget and Expenditures: Oversee budgets for the Human Resources, Staff Development, and Talent Acquisition teams, including forecasting, tracking, and monitoring expenditures. Provide monthly updates to management. Perform any other duties as assigned by the supervisor. Job Requirements: A recognised university degree in Human Resources Management, English Studies or related disciplines is preferred. A minimum of 12 years of experience in human resources, including at least 3 years in managerial roles within sizable organizations, ideally in public sector entities. Candidates with less experience will be considered for the Senior Manager position. Strong background in human resources management, encompassing areas such as Talent Acquisition, Organizational Development, Compensation & Benefits, Performance Management, and Learning & Development. Well-versed with prevailing trends in HR systems and HR practices Sound knowledge of the Hong Kong Employment Ordinance and related legislation. Highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of multitasking effectively. Proven ability in rapport building and stakeholder management. Resilient and well-organized leader of high integrity, possessing sound business acumen and judgment. High proficiency in written and spoken English, Chinese, and Putonghua. Proficient in MS Office applications. Live ASTRI values. Application The appointment will be on renewable contract terms with a competitive salary and performance-linked variable pay. Fringe benefits include paid leave, medical, insurance coverage and contribution to MPF. The incumbent will normally work a five-day week. For interested parties, please submit your application with detailed CV within two weeks of the post date. Applicants are encouraged to submit their applications as soon as possible. The review of applications will continue until the post is filled. The resume should not include any sensitive personal information such as ID card no. or passport number, photo, etc. Position offer is subject to the applicant’s experience and academic qualification. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. ASTRI reserves the right not to fill the position. ASTRI is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used exclusively for recruitment only. For details, please refer to ASTRI Privacy Policy Statement.

title: Assistant Manager – Digital Projects
description: About Us Founded in 1956, Maxim’s Group is one of Asia’s leading food and beverage companies, operating Chinese, Western, Japanese and Southeast Asian restaurants, quick service outlets, bakery shops and cafes, and an institutional catering service. Maxim's Group also produces a range of festive products, including the award-winning Hong Kong MX Mooncakes, and is a licensee of Starbucks Coffee, Genki Sushi, IPPUDO, The Cheesecake Factory and Shake Shack in various territories. Altogether, the Group has over 40,000 employees and 2,000 outlets in HK, China, Macao, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, Malaysia and Laos. Proud of our heritage and humbled by our success, we are committed to a sustainable and innovative future. To learn more about Maxim’s, visit www.maxims.com.hk. Job Responsibilities Drive digital projects across multiple business units as well as be part of the cross-functional team to achieve project goals. Determine the viability of new projects, identify the requirements, provide possible options/solutions to execute new ideas, and ensure a project is technically and operationally feasible as well as economically justifiable. Able to work with external vendors effectively to implement and maintain various digital projects, and ensure projects are delivered timely and with high quality Assure quality in deliverables by closely managing Digital project implementation, communicating efficiently with different parties and identifying project risks in advance. Report project status to management and stakeholders on a regular base. Ensure knowledge sharing on both project management and technical know-how between project/ cross-functional teams. Ability to lead and motivate a small team, and able to drive tactical plans. Coordinate with stakeholders and manage expectations. Consolidate and analyze requirements to propose feasible and practical solution(s), and corresponding Requirements and Design are required to be documented. Prepare training material and provide end user training. Resource planning and communicate with various internal teams and cope with a fast-paced environment. Job requirements University in Information Technology, Computer Science, E-commerce, or related disciplines Minimum 6 years, with at least 3 years of experience in digital application / CRM and customer data platform projects; and 1 year in managerial role. Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Experience in CRM, marketing automation and customer data platform (CDPs) solutions. Digital savvy. Passionate about the latest technology, data and problem solving. Ability to conduct technical feasibility study for new ideas and digital projects. Self-motivated, detail-oriented, able to manage multiple projects under pressure with tight deadlines. Excellent command in spoken and written English is a must. Experience in F&B industry will be a plus. Knowledge in technical development and Cloud will be a plus. Experience working in digital agency or SI vendor will be a plus. Knowledge in Analytics, SQL and AI technologies will be a plus. Knowledge in coding is preferred but not a must. Experience in Regional role and solution rollout will be highly advantageous. Familiarity with the latest CRM trends and technologies will be advantageous. Experienced candidates will be considered for a Manager grading. Interested parties please apply with full resume, state current and expected salaries by clicking "Apply Now". All applications and data collected will be treated in strict confidence and used exclusively for recruitment purposes. Only short listed candidates will be invited for interview. The company will retain the applications for a maximum period of 24 months and may refer suitable candidates to other vacancies within the Group.

title: SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST
description: Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or above, preferably in Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence or related disciplines Minimum 8 years of experience in AI, machine learning, and data analytics, with a proven track record to leverage large datasets for business impact Expertise in large language models (LLM) and familiarity with RAG methodologies Strong problem-solving abilities with a capacity to thrive in a fast-paced environment Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or Java Extensive experience with business intelligence (BI) data visualization tools Familiarity with big data technologies such as Spark and SQL for managing and querying large datasets Experience in MLOps and DevOps architecture design is a plus Responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights and identify trends Drive discussions with various business and technical teams and vendors to design and develop robust AI, LLM and data-driven solutions to address business challenges Design and create interactive dashboards that visualize key metrics and insights from data analysis Collaborate with data engineers and software developers to integrate AI solutions into existing systems Conduct research on emerging AI technologies and data analytics tools to enhance our capabilities Mentor junior team members and provide guidance on best practices in AI and data analysis Provide advanced analytics support and advise on appropriate analytical models based on available data, technology and platform (Candidates with less experience will be considered as Data Scientist.) Good remuneration and attractive fringe benefits will be offered to the successful applicant. Interested parties please apply with full resume, present and expected salary, available date by clicking "Apply Now". For further information, please visit our company website: www.shkp.com. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates. All personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only. Applicants not hearing from us within 3 months may consider their applications unsuccessful. All personal data collected will be destroyed within 24 months.

title: Junior Generative AI Security Analyst (VCO304/J02)
description: Seeking a proactive and technical-minded Jr Generative AI Security Analyst to join our IT Security Team. This role will be navigating the rapidly evolving landscape of Artificial Intelligence (AI). The successful will be involved in setting up, evaluating and reporting on AI tools and models with a focus on security. Responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive security assessments for internal and external generative AI systems Develop and execute security testing methodologies for Generative AI models Assist with setting up local language models using tools like ollama Identify and document potential vulnerabilities in Generative AI systems Analyze Generative AI model risks, including prompt injection, data leakage, and adversarial attacks Create detailed technical reports on Generative AI security findings and configuration guidelines Collaborate with internal AI development teams to implement security recommendations Research emerging AI security threats and mitigation strategies Requirements: Degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science or the equivalent with minimum 1 year of relevant experience in IT, cybersecurity and risk management Basic understanding of machine learning and AI principles Sound knowledge in Generative AI models o GPT o Llama o Claude o DeepSeek Proficiency in: o Python o Cybersecurity tools o Machine learning model analysis o Vulnerability assessment techniques Familiarity with: o AI model testing frameworks o Adversarial machine learning concepts o Cloud security principles o Running or setting up locally run models (ie ollama) o Prompt engineering techniques

title: Manager, Business & Digital Transformation
description: Responsibilities: Take full ownership of leading and managing complex digital transformation projects, including AI-powered solutions and ERP system enhancements, to drive operational efficiency, scalability, and business growth. Act as a key driver of change, leveraging strong communication, influence, and people skills to align stakeholders, build consensus, and foster collaboration across cross-functional teams. Use structured problem-solving approaches to address challenges, identify root causes, and develop actionable plans to drive project success. Dive into technical details when necessary to effectively guide internal and external teams, navigating challenges and proactively steering project progress rather than passively following up or chasing tasks. Partner with Department Heads to identify opportunities for process improvement and act as a change agent to ensure the smooth rollout and adoption of transformative initiatives. Handle routine system administration tasks as needed to support operational workflows, while focusing primarily on transformation projects. Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree or above in Business Management, Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems, or related disciplines. Minimum 5 years of experience in managing digital transformation projects, preferably involving AI implementation and ERP system enhancements. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and deliver complex projects on time, within scope, and with measurable impact. Technical aptitude with the ability to dive into technical details when needed; experience with SQL and/or Python programming is a significant advantage. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to influence stakeholders, build alignment, and drive collaboration. Strong structured problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify root causes and translate challenges into actionable solutions. Self-starter who takes initiative and is willing to roll up their sleeves to ensure project success. Experience with ERP systems and AI-powered technologies is highly preferred.
